00057 #ifndef MR_MEM_CHECK
00058 
00059 inline
00060 void* operator     new( size_t size )  throw(std::bad_alloc)
00061 {
00062    return mi_mem_allocate( static_cast<int>( size ) );
00063 }
00064 
00065 inline
00066 void* operator   new[]( size_t size )  throw(std::bad_alloc)
00067 {
00068    return mi_mem_allocate( static_cast<int>( size ) );
00069 }
00070 
00071 inline
00072 void operator     delete( void* ptr ) throw()
00073 {
00074    mi_mem_release( ptr );
00075 }
00076 
00077 inline
00078 void operator   delete[]( void* ptr ) throw()
00079 {  
00080    mi_mem_release( ptr );
00081 }

00084 #else  // MR_MEM_CHECK
00085 
00086 #include "mrMemoryDbg.h"
00087 
00088 inline
00089 void* operator new ( size_t size )  throw(std::bad_alloc)
00090 {
00091    mi_lock( _memAllocLock );
00092    void* x = _dbg_alloc( size, 0, "(not specified)" ); 
00093    mi_unlock( _memAllocLock );
00094    return x;
00095 }
00096 
00097 inline
00098 void* operator new[] ( size_t size )  throw(std::bad_alloc)
00099 {
00100    mi_lock( _memAllocLock );
00101    void* x = _dbg_alloc( size, 0, "(not specified)" ); 
00102    mi_unlock( _memAllocLock );
00103    return x;
00104 } 
00105  
00106 inline
00107 void operator delete    ( void* addr ) throw()
00108 {
00109    mi_lock( _memAllocLock );
00110    _dbg_delete( addr ); 
00111    mi_unlock( _memAllocLock );
00112 }
00113 
00114 inline
00115 void operator delete[] ( void* addr ) throw()
00116 {
00117    mi_lock( _memAllocLock ); 
00118    _dbg_delete( addr ); 
00119    mi_unlock( _memAllocLock );
00120 }

00123 void* operator new ( size_t size, const char* const file,
00124                      const unsigned int line ) 
00125 {
00126    mi_lock( _memAllocLock ); 
00127    void* x = _dbg_alloc( size, line, file ); 
00128    mi_unlock( _memAllocLock );
00129    return x;

00149    mi_unlock( _memAllocLock );
